BasicInfo.short: AppFusions closes the gap between enterprise system silos, providing seamless integrated user experiences.

Products.name: Dropbox in IBM Connections (cloud or on-premise)
Products.description: Allows IBM Connections users to access, preview, upload, download Dropbox files directly from IBM Connections.

Products.name: UserVoice to Atlassian JIRA Integrations
Products.description: Being able to push UserVoice customer feedback or helpdesk input to JIRA, for engineering response and input, is a natural workflow

Products.name: Google Apps SSO Authenticator for Atlassian JIRA
Products.description: Allows users to sign into JIRA using their Google Apps account. 2-factor authentication and ServiceDesk also supported.

Products.name: SpeakMyLanguage Translations for Atlassian JIRA
Products.description: Translation plugin for Atlassian JIRA allowing you to perform FAST translations for any JIRA issues

Products.name: IBM Sametime for Atlassian Stash
Products.description: IBM Sametime natively integrated in Atlassian Stash

Products.name: Google Analytics for Atlassian Confluence
Products.description: A dynamic web traffic analytics reporting plugin for Confluence.

Products.name: Enterprise Directory & Org Chart for Atlassian Confluence
Products.description: The Enterprise Directory and Org Chart provides a searchable directory and graphical organization chart of your Confluence userbase,

Products.name: Egnyte in Atlassian JIRA
Products.description: Access, preview, and link Egnyte files to JIRA issues directly from JIRA.

Products.name: Google Drive in IBM Connections (cloud or on-premise)
Products.description: Allows IBM Connections users to access, preview, upload, download Google Drive files directly from IBM Connections.

Products.name: Enterprise Translation Hub for Atlassian Confluence
Products.description: Create and translation your Confluence product doc without leaving Confluence. Post-edits, 100+ languages, single-source, workflows, more.
